creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: green, 1/2"-1" woven and embroidered bands, all with narrow blue and red stripes with many different patterns separated by tan strips; 2-3/4"-3-1/2" warp fringe at ends; fringe is knotted at very end
dimension: 31 1/2 x 11 in. (80.01 x 27.94 cm) (length including fringe)
title: Head Scarf
